scripts.clean:app: del tmp-release-* アニメ画像に変換する君*
scripts.copy:release:app-mac: npm run copy:release:app && node-mv tmp-release tmp-release-mac
scripts.copy:release:bin-mac: mkdir tmp-release-mac/bin/ && npm run copy:release:webp-mac && npm run copy:release:apngasm-mac
scripts.package-mac: electron-packager ./tmp-release-mac 'アニメ画像に変換する君' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --overwrite --asar --icon='resources/app.icns'
scripts.release-mac: npm run clean:app && npm run build:app && npm run copy:release:app-mac && npm run copy:release:bin-mac && npm run install:package-mac && npm run package-mac
scripts.copy:release:app-win32: npm run copy:release:app && node-mv tmp-release tmp-release-win32
scripts.copy:release:bin-win32: mkdir tmp-release-win32/bin/ && npm run copy:release:webp-win32 && npm run copy:release:apngasm-win32
scripts.release-win32: npm run clean:app && npm run build:app && npm run copy:release:app-win32 && npm run copy:release:bin-win32 && npm run package-win32
